forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 58F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High around 65F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.
